fields.name: AverageUtilizationPercentage
fields.description: Estimated average utilization percentage for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, with this commitment.

fields.name: BenefitCost
fields.description: The estimated cost with benefit for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period. It's equal to (commitmentAmount * totalHours)

fields.name: CommitmentAmount
fields.description: The commitment amount at the commitmentGranularity.

fields.name: CoveragePercentage
fields.description: Estimated benefit coverage percentage for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, with this commitment.

fields.name: OverageCost
fields.description: The difference between total cost and benefit cost for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period.

fields.name: SavingsAmount
fields.description: The amount saved for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, by purchasing the recommended quantity of the benefit.

fields.name: SavingsPercentage
fields.description: The savings in percentage for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, by purchasing the recommended quantity of benefit.

fields.name: TotalCost
fields.description: Total cost, which is sum of benefit cost and overage cost.
